Articles.Content:
Greetings! I've posted here before, but since I need to get those five posts approved I figured I'd drop by and say hello.

I'm from Europe, and I've been playing KSP for around two years, pretty long time by my standards but definitely not even close to some people here! I don't consider myself a KSP expert by any means, my biggest achievement (so far) is a manned Duna landing, and I even managed to return the kerbals home! I also made a little colony on the Mun once, but it was nothing impressive really, just a single lab with landing legs.

Anyway, I'm glad to be able to make an account here, thank you!!!

A Duna landing and return is pretty significant. If you can do that you can do most other things. 

And hello.
Welcome aboard! I've racked up ~700 hours in KSP and haven't achieved half the stuff you have. Impressive stuff!

Well.. I have yet to leave the Kerbin SOI  - I'm having enough fun building two stations around Kerbin and the Mun as of now...

But Welcome to the forum x)

Hello!

On 7/2/2023 at 7:10 PM, pipe said:

I don't consider myself a KSP expert by any means, my biggest achievement (so far) is a manned Duna landing, and I even managed to return the kerbals home!

I have amassed almost 500 hours in both games now, and I've just gotten something to Duna once, a little Huygens-style probe. It did not return... pretty neat stuff!

On 7/3/2023 at 1:10 AM, pipe said:

Greetings! I've posted here before, but since I need to get those five posts approved I figured I'd drop by and say hello.

I'm from Europe, and I've been playing KSP for around two years, pretty long time by my standards but definitely not even close to some people here! I don't consider myself a KSP expert by any means, my biggest achievement (so far) is a manned Duna landing, and I even managed to return the kerbals home! I also made a little colony on the Mun once, but it was nothing impressive really, just a single lab with landing legs.

Anyway, I'm glad to be able to make an account here, thank you!!!

I have played KSP for over half a decade and I still have not landed on duna and returned. (probably since i only play on and off and since i have not enough time ever since joining the modding community in 2021). A duna landing is pretty impressive especially for a player that has only been playing for two years. A suggestion would be to land on laythe and return (consider using jet engines) or designing a Single Stage To Orbit SSTO plane.

On 7/17/2023 at 7:29 AM, JNSQFan said:

I have played KSP for over half a decade and I still have not landed on duna and returned. (probably since i only play on and off and since i have not enough time ever since joining the modding community in 2021). A duna landing is pretty impressive especially for a player that has only been playing for two years. A suggestion would be to land on laythe and return (consider using jet engines) or designing a Single Stage To Orbit SSTO plane.

I did actually manage to make a working SSTO a few months back, after many, *many* failed attempts. It wasn't able to carry any cargo, just orbit. I never went to Laythe though, thank you for the suggestion!
That's about how well mine work.
